goals__remit:
European Aluminium is an international non-profit association representing more than 80 members across the entire value chain of the aluminium industry.  
 
With more than 600 plants –including primary production, transformation and recycling- and accounting for 1 million direct and indirect jobs, European Aluminium is the voice of the aluminium industry in Europe. 
 
Our main purpose is to engage with decision-makers across Europe and promote the unique properties of aluminium, secure industrial competitiveness, invest in innovative solutions and drive the contribution our metal can make to Europe’s sustainability and to tackle societal challenges.  
 
Through environmental and technical expertise, economic and statistical analysis, scientific research, best practices, public affairs and transparent communication activities, European Aluminium encourages the use of aluminium as an enabling material to achieve Europe’s GHG emissions reduction, ambitious circular economy targets and the renaissance of European sustainable industrial base.
